text: @ imKBRshanthnu big fm office da. As much as we can get. Water is running short.
Need 10000 bottles of water urgently. Please send to Big fm office. We are there. Or tweet # ChennaiMicro we will come pick it up.
It's pouring again. This is going to take longer than we hoped. Please donate. Send supplies, funds. Do not venture out. Be safe. # TNFlood
@vikiKadarkarai contact number please. I will have it picked up.
@ cpswathi @ RJ_Balaji go to big fm office now please. Volunteers are waiting. Please confirm. Give me a contact number.
All supplies can be dropped off at Big FM office opposite Palm Grove hotel on kodambakkam high road. Donate. Now. # ChennaiMicro # TNflood
V Trust. Union Bank of India. Vadapalani branch. A/c 533102010503421. IFSC UBIN0553310. Swift code - UBININBBICN. MICR-600026033. # SidBalaji
# ChennaiMicroFund contribution A/c Name: V Trust, A/C NO: 533102010503421, UNION BANK OF INDIA, IFSC CODE: UBIN0553310. # ChennaiMicro
# ChennaiMicro fed 20000 people today. Very proud of our volunteers. They outdid themselves. Tomorrow will be better. We need your support.
Back in connectivity. Productive day. Tomorrow will be better. Please donate. Hopefully the worst is over. Let's start rebuilding.
# ChennaiMicroFund contribution A/c Name: V Trust, A/C NO: 533102010503421, UNION BANK OF INDIA, IFSC CODE: UBIN0553310. # SiddharthRJbalaji
Will post account details of a trust soon. If you would like to send donations for relief work done by @ RJ_Balaji and me.. Plsss do
Big fm office opposite palmgrove hotel. Send all relief supplies here. This is base camp for # chennaimicro Blankets water paai priority.
Need a volunteer with vehicle in poondhamallee area urgent. # ChennaiMicro
10 vehicles doing bedding and food water drops from 3pm. Come on # Chennai we need more. Blankets priority! # ChennaiMicro
Please tag @ archanakalpathi for immediate response from # ChennaiMicro and to reach me or @ RJ_Balaji She is holding fort till 5pm. # TNflood
No network. Putting up # ChennaiMicro volunteer team info. Tweet me. Also call them of they are near you. Food water blankets. Please.
Volunteer team needed in Anna Nagar. Urgent. Please contact. # ChennaiMicro
Contact @ RJ_Balaji me and our team with hashtag # ChennaiMicro DO NOT RT RANDOMLY. ONLY VERIFIED DONORS AND INFO PLEASE.
tried to access saidapet, ashok Nagar and velacheri today... The Navy is doing its best there...We have no access. Will try again tomorrow.
# Paai is the best bedding for the affected at this time..Women & kids sleeping on wet floors. We need maximum # Paais for them. # ChennaiMicro
Youngsters. In groups of 5-10. Contact us. We have relief work for you to do. Vehicle preferable. Contact us. # ChennaiMicro @ RJ_Balaji
The latest lunch parcels pickup is 1pm (min 200pc) Need 1000 blankets urgently. If you have a team with a vehicle contact me. # ChennaiMicro
@ anbknaga please continue your support tomorrow. Thanks.
We have more vehicles tomorrow and we have a bigger team. It will be a better day. Stay strong # Chennai Please help us. # chennaimicro
Requirements - Food (rice based - minimum 200) . Water (packets/bottles) . Blankets (PRIORITY). Please contact us. # chennaimicro @ RJ_Balaji
Special salute to the jain temple volunteers. You people are angels over 1000kgs of cooked food given today. # TNflood # chennaimicro
So many young female volunteers on the roads helping the affected. Chennai is in good hands. We can do more. Will post needs in some time.
There are so many volunteers fighting for # Chennai Very proud of the solidarity we saw today. Hats off to police, navy, and corporation too.
Sorry we missed a lot of sos messages because of network crash. Continue to send information to # ChennaiMicro @ rj_balaji
@ anbknaga on our way. Thank you.
It's pouring again. We are losing connectivity. Evening meals are being arranged. We need water. Please contact with leads. # ChennaiMicro
@ anbknaga contact info
@ sandeep_prabhaa @ RJ_Balaji contact info
It would be very useful if the govt declared emergency today. The police on ground share this sentiment. chaos on the roads. # TNFlood
Urgent. Need 1000 water packets. Please contact us immediately. # ChennaiMicro # TNflood
@ prithinarayanan @ RJ_Balaji check dm prithi
If anyone has innova or Scorpio cars to spare please contact us. We need more vehicles. # TNflood # chennaimicro
@ ram22april yes we can
More food packets needed for lunch. Will pick up. Rice items only. Urgent. # TNflood # chennaimicro
@ poojthejooj they are fine.
@ dheerajk_dr contact details for defence colony families?
@ Meyyappan_p tulip apartments house details?
Please use hashtag # ChennaiMicro for food parcel pickup information. It will be easier for our team to respond. Thanks. @ rj_balaji
@ thehellogenie where can we pick up?
@FakingIndian confirm. Will pick up at noon.
Kotturpuram accessible only from adyar side. All other routes closed. # TNflood
Adyar bridge is open. Slow because of sightseeing crowds. Police requesting us to tell people to stay home. # TNflood
If you are not part of relief work please stay indoors. People crowding bridges to see flood sights are a nuisance. Stay home. # TNflood
If you can organise food packets in chennai please contact me. We will have it picked up and delivered. Batches of 50-100 packets. # TNflood
@ poojthejooj address
@ paytm we are looking to you to be at your best these next few days. Please watch out for failed transactions. We need you. Thanks. # TNflood
Rain is down to drizzle in some parts. May the dawn bring hope and relief to our people. Be safe. Go out only in groups. Pray. # TNflood
@ jayam_mohanraja call you on the morning anna.
Ippo kutram kurailam solli projanam illai. Adhellam adutha vaaram pesuvom. Ippo seyyavendiyadhu mattum senja podhum. # Help # Please. # TNflood
@ khushsundar call you in the morning ma. God bless.
Need an extra mechanic for transport relief work. If anyone has a reliable contact please post to me or @ rj_balaji
@ Chinmayi check dm. Will send you coordinates.
@ actor_viishnu will call you da
@ Udhaystalin thank you nanba. God bless.
We have a 5 car convoy patrolling affected areas in # Chennai . Please collect genuine transport issues and post to me & @ rj_balaji # TNflood
We are getting reports that excess food packets are getting wasted. Till the rains stop transport is crucial. Shelter is available. # TNflood
If you see people in water, please drop them to dry land. If there's any way you can drive around please do. Help the relief work. # TNflood
driving around doing pickups and drips tomorrow. Currently food and clothing are secondary. Transport is first priority. Please RT # TNflood
Please send tweets to @ rj_balaji & me. We are trying to contact groups to spread information for stranded people. Every message/call counts.
Relief operations by army and navy in many areas. Thank you. In the meantime...look out your window. If you spot anyone reach out. # TNflood
Thank you SPI and AGS cinemas for opening doors for the affected. God bless you. # TNflood # Chennai
Will talk to all national media channels tomorrow. This cannot go under the radar. The worst flood in a century in # TAMILNADU we need help.
It's official. We're now a disaster zone!Army deployed. DO NOT LEAVE YOUR HOME. it's going to get MUCH WORSE! God show mercy on us. # TNflood
My beautiful niece Arya smiled through all the chaos. Hopefully when she grows up we'll be better prepared. # TNfloodpic.twitter.com/l69E4Oga5U
Many people died in their cars in the Bombay floods because power windows and central locking jammed. Don't sit in broken down cars. # flood
If you see anyone stuck in a broken down car waiting for the # rain to stop... Please evacuate them to higher ground. It is very unsafe.
Just spoke on CNN-IBN ... If you are a concerned Indian please tell everybody you know about # TamilNadu. This is a disaster. We are sinking.
Bathrooms submerged. Water coming out of the drains. I am an affluent actor. This is my house. Imagine rest of TN.pic.twitter.com/tjU2O2vESw
House flooded. Moving to the terrace. God save Tamil Nadu.pic.twitter.com/zf1Q18DSGx
Power grids have been shut down for safety reasons. No power till rain stops. We are now in darkness. This is depressing. Over and out.
Be safe. Sit back, relax and enjoy the beauty of # Casanova https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HXbhna7SHo4 … # JilJungJuk # TheriChristmaspic.twitter.com/uK4dlL9wnj
# Andrea Jeremiah has blessed our film with the most sensuous vocal rendition of the year. Thank you dear # divahttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HXbhna7SHo4 …
Thank you dear # Jammy @ arya_offl for releasing # Casanova Big hug and thanks from team # JilJungJuk https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HXbhna7SHo4 … @ Composer_Vishal
Presenting # Casanova sung by # Andrea 4th Single from # JilJungJuk Music @ Composer_Vishal lyrics @ lyricist_vivek https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HXbhna7SHo4 …
Hats off to Lawrence master... his charity is helping so many people in need. Compassion is a super power. We can all make a difference.
We are entertainers first. we will try and go ahead and entertain you. This team brings you # Casanova # JilJungJukpic.twitter.com/g0zEZbCgG4
This is common in # CHENNAI now. What are our people supposed to do? Where is the # hope # ChennaiRainspic.twitter.com/vv3hNuZFaj
Looking for apartments to shift families of my crew. Lots of people in my office and home for shelter. Please share information about flats.
Expected to be the worst # rain # devastation in over a century in these parts. There are non govt groups dist food & clothes to the affected.
All our lives & livelihood screeching to a halt. Hearing amazing stories of kindness & bravery by common citizens. Keep reaching out. # HELP
Three of our post production suites are flooded. Shifting all equipment to new locations. Day & night work to finish our film. # JilJungJuk
Very scary day for # Chennai again. People's houses are # flooding. Electric poles and trees falling. Please be safe. Stay indoors. Praying.
@ KyaUkhaadLega tum mujhe # palazzo main tumhe bar doonga. Chalo ukhado:)
Congrats SPI cinemas on # PalazzoBySPI Looks really cool! You guys always set the bar high:)pic.twitter.com/UAAzJf5EwP
